languages.text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави, однако Леди Кассия видит куда больше. Этот образ она описывает как лиловую вуаль слепой безысходности, испещренную лазурью и багрянцем, в которой навигатор считывает печать гнева и боли. Но даже ее взор не в силах пройти сквозь эту завесу.

traits.locale_text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави, однако Леди Кассия видит куда больше. Свое видение она описывает как лиловую вуаль слепой безысходности, испещренную лазурью и багрянцем, в которой Навигатор считывает печать гнева и боли. Но даже ее взор не в силах пройти сквозь эту завесу.

languages.text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.
languages.original_text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави, однако Леди Кассия видит куда больше. Этот образ она описывает как лиловую вуаль слепой безысходности, испещренную лазурью и багрянцем, в которой навигатор считывает печать гнева и боли. Но даже ее взор не в силах пройти сквозь эту завесу.

traits.locale_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the mystery of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia sees much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

languages.text: 早在瑞斯塔维星系的异常状况出现之前，飞船上的仪器就失效了。不过，卡西娅女士所能看到的事物比仪器要多得多。根据她的描述，眼前的这副景象是象征盲目绝望的紫色面纱，上面点缀着天蓝色与深红色。卡西娅能从中看出愤怒与痛苦的痕迹，但即使是她，也无法看透这层面纱。
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

traits.locale_text: 早在瑞斯塔维星系的异常状况出现之前，飞船上的仪器就失效了。不过，卡西娅女士所能看到的事物比仪器要多得多。根据她的描述，眼前的这副景象是象征盲目绝望的紫色面纱，上面点缀着天蓝色与深红色。卡西娅能从中看出愤怒与痛苦的痕迹，但即使是她，也无法看透这层面纱。

languages.text: 船の計器類はラエス・タウィ星系の異常の前には無力だが、レディ・カシアはそれ以上のものを見ることができる。彼女はこのイメージを、紺碧と深紅が点在する、盲目的な絶望の紫色のベールと表現し、航宙士はそこに怒りと痛みの痕跡を読み取る。しかし、彼女の目ですら、このベールを突き破ることはできない。
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

traits.locale_text: 船の計器類はラエス・タウィ星系の異常の前には無力だが、レディ・カシアはそれ以上のものを見ることができる。彼女はこのイメージを、紺碧と深紅が点在する、盲目的な絶望の紫色のベールと表現し、航宙士はそこに怒りと痛みの痕跡を読み取る。しかし、彼女の目ですら、このベールを突き破ることはできない。

languages.text: Los instrumentos de la nave son inútiles ante la aberración del sistema Raeth-Tawi, pero lady Cassia es capaz de ver mucho más. Describe esta imagen como un velo púrpura de ciega desesperanza, manchado de azur y carmesí, en el que la Navegante lee la huella de la ira y el dolor. Sin embargo, ni siquiera su vista es capaz de atravesar este velo.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

traits.locale_text: Los instrumentos de la nave son inútiles ante la aberración del sistema Raeth-Tawi, pero lady Cassia es capaz de ver mucho más. Describe esta imagen como un velo púrpura de ciega desesperanza, manchado de azur y carmesí, en el que la Navegante lee la huella de la ira y el dolor. Sin embargo, ni siquiera su vista es capaz de atravesar este velo.

languages.text: Die Instrumente des Schiffs sind machtlos gegen die Aberration des Raeth-Tawi-Systems, doch Lady Cassia sieht viel mehr. Sie beschreibt dieses Bild als violetten Schleier der blinden Hoffnungslosigkeit, durchzogen von Azur und Purpur, worin die Navigatorin die Spuren und Wut und Schmerz erkennt. Aber nicht einmal ihre Sicht ist in der Lage, diesen Schleier zu durchdringen.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

traits.locale_text: Die Instrumente des Schiffs sind machtlos gegen die Aberration des Raeth-Tawi-Systems, doch Lady Cassia sieht viel mehr. Sie beschreibt dieses Bild als violetten Schleier der blinden Hoffnungslosigkeit, durchzogen von Azur und Purpur, worin die Navigatorin die Spuren und Wut und Schmerz erkennt. Aber nicht einmal ihre Sicht ist in der Lage, diesen Schleier zu durchdringen.

languages.text: Si les instruments du vaisseau sont impuissants face à l'aberration du système Raeth-Tawi, on ne peut pas en dire autant de dame Cassia. La navigatrice décrit le spectacle qui s'offre à vous comme un voile pourpre de désespoir aveugle, parsemé de touches d'azur et d'écarlate dans lesquelles elle perçoit l'empreinte de la rage et de la souffrance. Cependant, son regard si perçant soit-il est lui aussi incapable de percer cette énigme.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.

traits.locale_text: Si les instruments du vaisseau sont impuissants face à l'aberration du système Raeth-Tawi, on ne peut pas en dire autant de dame Cassia. La navigatrice décrit le spectacle qui s'offre à vous comme un voile pourpre de désespoir aveugle, parsemé de touches d'azur et d'écarlate dans lesquelles elle perçoit l'empreinte de la rage et de la souffrance. Cependant, son regard si perçant soit-il est lui aussi incapable de percer cette énigme.

languages.text: Geminin araçları, Raeth-Tawi sistemindeki sapkı karşısında güçsüz kalırken aynısı Lady Cassia için söylenemez. Önündeki manzarayı; öfkenin ve acının izlerini taşıyan, masmavi ve kızıl dokunuşlarla bezeli, kör bir umutsuzluğun mor örtüsü olarak tanımlıyor. Ancak Rotacı'nın bakışları, bu örtünün ötesini görmeyi başaramıyor.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system, but Lady Cassia is able to see much more. She describes this image as a purple veil of blind hopelessness, dotted with azure and crimson, in which the Navigator reads the imprint of anger and pain. However, not even her sight is capable of piercing this veil.
